name: Space Invaders (itch) (x00F)
description:
Aliens are attacking your ship, and you need to stop them. Shoot them with your lasers, but beware, they shoot back! This is a recreation of "Space Invaders" by Taito Corporation.

NOTE: PC only

If you travel too far to the border on either the left or right side, your laser will be disabled. Currently there is no fix, so if this happens then refresh your page. A suggestion would be to stay in close proximity to the bunkers.

Key Binds:

A / Left Arrow: Move Left

D / Right Arrow: Move Right

Space Bar / Left Mouse Button: Shoot
